description: Welcome home to Northview Place in the heart of Port Coquitlam's Riverwood District! Completely renovated from top to bottom in 2019 & lovingly cared for since! This 3 bedroom & flex townhome offers style & functionality with a bright, open living/dining area & a spacious chef's kitchen with quarts countertops, island & stainless steel appliances. Upstairs, the primary suite boasts a walk-in closet & spa-inspired ensuite, with two more large bedrooms. The lower level includes a flex space, ideal for an office, gym or 4th bedroom. Enjoy the fenced yard with grass & balcony for your BBQ. Double garage & ample street parking add convenience. Insuite laundry room with sink. Proactive strata with new roof & new vinyl fence.
